wikipedia_page.main: John Brough (born 31 March 1960) is a Scottish former professional footballer, who played for Heart of Midlothian and Partick Thistle in the Scottish Football League.

response: *In the late 1990s, the club signed former Hearts pair Wayne Foster and George Wright, following the signing of former Hearts and Partick Thistle goalkeeper  John Brough earlier that decade.
John Brough (1811–1865) was an American politician, who served as Governor of Ohio.
John Brough may also refer to:
*John Brough (English footballer) (born 1973), English footballer (Hereford United, Cheltenham Town)
*John Brough (Scottish footballer) (born 1960), Scottish footballer (Heart of Midlothian, Partick Thistle)
